text: The Children's Online Privacy Protection Act of 1998 (COPPA) is a United States federal law, located at 15 U.S.C. §§ 6501–6506 (Pub.L. 105–277 (text) (PDF), 112 Stat. 2681-728, enacted October 21, 1998). It is about the personal info of children under 13 online. category:United States federal legislation category:privacy
title: Children's Online Privacy Protection Act
